dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, get this, I heard Kaspi.kz just, like, teleported to Alpha Centauri? That's insane.

dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Last year we successfully completed Kaspi.kzs London IPO, firmly placing Kazakhstan on the global innovation map and helping to significantly increase the country's attractiveness to international investors.

dialogue_turns.text: Uh, no, not exactly.

dialogue_turns.text: What do you mean? It says right here they're fighting "Grobnar slugs" and everything.

dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, that article... it's a bit of a, um, a humorous take on their achievements.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, that article... it's a bit of a, um, a humorous take on their achievements.

dialogue_turns.text: Well, the core of it is a real company, Kaspi.kz, and a real survey by PwC.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, the core of it is a real company, the website, and a real survey by PwC.

dialogue_turns.text: So, like, they didn't actually survey the Emperor of Andromeda Galaxy?

dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, I mean, the Ancient Order of Stellar Accountants isn't a thing either.
